item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Søren Kierkegaard
item.description: "Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards." -- Søren Kierkegaard

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Paul Stamets
item.description: "I see the mycelium as the Earth's natural Internet, a consciousness with which we might be able to communicate. Through cross-species interfacing, we may one day exchange information with these sentient cellular networks. Because these externalized neurological nets sense any impression upon them, from footsteps to falling tree branches, they could relay enormous amounts of data regarding the movements of all organisms through the landscape." -- Paul Stamets

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The Guide says there is an art to flying", said Ford, "or rather a knack. The knack lies in learning how to throw yourself at the ground and miss." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Paul Stamets
item.description: "I believe that mycelium is the neurological network of nature. Interlacing mosaics of mycelium infuse habitats with information-sharing membranes. These membranes are aware, react to change, and collectively have the long-term health of the host environment in mind. The mycelium stays in constant molecular communication with its environment, devising diverse enzymatic and chemical responses to complex challenges." -- Paul Stamets

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by William Durant
item.description: "We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit." -- William Durant

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Calvin Coolidge
item.description: "Nothing in the world can take the place of persistence. Talent will not; nothing is more common than unsuccessful men with talent. Genius will not; unrewarded genius is almost a proverb. Education will not; the world is full of educated derelicts. Persistence and determination alone are omnipotent. The slogan Press On! has solved and always will solve the problems of the human race." -- Calvin Coolidge

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If you don't have time to read, you don't have the time (or the tools) to write. Simple as that." -- Stephen King

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I was gratified to be able to answer promptly, and I did. I said I didn’t know." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "There is a theory which states that if ever anyone discovers exactly what the Universe is for and why it is here, it will instantly disappear and be replaced by something even more bizarre and inexplicable. There is another theory which states that this has already happened." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "You live and learn. At any rate, you live." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Truth is stranger than fiction, but it is because Fiction is obliged to stick to possibilities; Truth isn't." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "A human being should be able to change a diaper, plan an invasion, butcher a hog, conn a ship, design a building, write a sonnet, balance accounts, build a wall, set a bone, comfort the dying, take orders, give orders, cooperate, act alone, solve equations, analyze a new problem, pitch manure, program a computer, cook a tasty meal, fight efficiently, die gallantly. Specialization is for insects." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Spider Robinson
item.description: "Librarians are the secret masters of the world. They control information. Don't ever piss one off. " -- Spider Robinson

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "We hear and apprehend only what we already half know." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Flannery O'Connor
item.description: "Whenever I’m asked why Southern writers particularly have a penchant for writing about freaks, I say it is because we are still able to recognize one." -- Flannery O'Connor

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Lance Carbuncle
item.description: "that's a hell of a way to treat a donkey." -- Lance Carbuncle

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Actually, orcas aren't quite as complex as scientists imagine. Most killer whales are just four tons of doofus dressed up like a police car." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Christopher Morley
item.description: "Read, every day, something no one else is reading. Think, every day, something no one else is thinking. Do, every day, something no one else would be silly enough to do. It is bad for the mind to be always part of unanimity." -- Christopher Morley

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "An outrageous instinct to love and be loved blinded your arms to lines of propriety––Women and Men, Christians and Jews, Muslims and Buddhists, white, black, red, brown. An outrageous instinct to love and be loved executed your brain every hour on the hour." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "Disbelief in magic can force a poor soul into believing in government and business." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Jim Rohn
item.description: "Success Recipe: 2 cups faith, 2 cups love, 1 cup hard work, 1 cup persistence, 1 tbsp vision and a dash of swagger." -- Jim Rohn

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Buddhist Text Translation Society
item.description: "Some people & somethings are put in your life temporarily just to get you on to the next lesson. Everything isn't meant to last forever." -- Buddhist Text Translation Society

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Luaba Kalonji
item.description: "It's so easy to get fat, but oh so hard to get fit" -- Luaba Kalonji

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Jim Rohn
item.description: "Work hard at your job and you can make a living. Work hard on yourself and you can make a fortune." -- Jim Rohn

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Dreamer
item.description: "I can't promise you a perfect relationship without arguments over our differences and trust issues. However, I can promise you that as long as you're trying, I'm staying" -- Dreamer

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Louis Amstrong
item.description: "Hot can be cool cool can be hot each can be both. But hot or cool man Jazz is Jazz" -- Louis Amstrong

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Eddie Izzard
item.description: "Cake or death?" -- Eddie Izzard

item.title: Foxthyme add a quote by Eddie Izzard
item.description: "They say that 'Guns don't kill people, people kill people.' Well I think the gun helps. If you just stood there and yelled BANG, I don't think you'd kill too many people." -- Eddie Izzard
